column4: How do I tell if I have the latest driver for my REALLY outdated ATI card (MobilityRadeon X300)?
run software update, if there is something available it will tell you.
Also, how do I tell what drivers I have? I heard the x.org project built drivers manually
run the driver wizard (that's the easy way). Or, grep the Xorg.log file, it will tell you which driver is being used.
